title: I recently moved to Wilmington from New Bern. That said, the New Bern Sun Journal would print the vote of our state and congressional reps along with a short blurb of the bills they voted on. Why does the Star News not provide this info?If the Star does , could you provide a link?
text:
Here's a link you might find useful:
http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4570
